entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries near noon then 60 percent chance of rain showers early this afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Wednesday 08 February 2023
